about_the_game:
Wandersong & Friends (A Remix Album)
1. The Dream King [remixed by Lena Raine]
2. Mysterious Rainbow Girl [remixed by pongball]
3. Dreamscape [remixed by scntfc]
4. Chismest [remixed by sintecta]
5. It's a Ghost!!! [remixed by dloot]
6. Miriam [remixed by James Roach]
7. The Bard [remixed by Adrian Talens]
8. Call of the Coffee Pirates [remixed by John Robert Matz]
9. Thunderstorm [remixed by Joonas Turner]
10. Conflicted Santa (The Baron) [remixed by Alec Holowka]
11. The Crater [remixed by Scattle]
12. Memories of Spirit World (Moonscape) [remixed by Gabriel Koenig]
13. Song of the Wayfarer [remixed by Halina Heron]
detailed_description:
Wandersong & Friends (A Remix Album)
1. The Dream King [remixed by Lena Raine]
2. Mysterious Rainbow Girl [remixed by pongball]
3. Dreamscape [remixed by scntfc]
4. Chismest [remixed by sintecta]
5. It's a Ghost!!! [remixed by dloot]
6. Miriam [remixed by James Roach]
7. The Bard [remixed by Adrian Talens]
8. Call of the Coffee Pirates [remixed by John Robert Matz]
9. Thunderstorm [remixed by Joonas Turner]
10. Conflicted Santa (The Baron) [remixed by Alec Holowka]
11. The Crater [remixed by Scattle]
12. Memories of Spirit World (Moonscape) [remixed by Gabriel Koenig]
13. Song of the Wayfarer [remixed by Halina Heron]

Minimum:
  • OS: any
  • Processor: any
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes

name: Wandersong & Friends (Soundtrack Remix Album)

short_description: An album of 13 remixes of our favorite tracks from Wandersong, by our favorite people!
